snippet.title: PC Survival Horror Game: Hidden Shelter Teaser
snippet.description:
Hidden Shelter is a first-person horror game, focused on exploration. It is under development on the Unreal Engine for Windows PC and the launch window is scheduled for December 2020 to March 2021.

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1422820/Hidden_Shelter/

Website: https://whitevortex.com.br/

#HiddenShelterGame #SurvivalHorror #IndieGame
